author: jcorvel
msg: (serf-skelta-default): Remove the notice that suggested setting
SVNAllowBulkUpdates to Prefer in the absence of caching servers. It's
overly strong, and ignores the other (still undocumented) benefit of
not fetching pristines which are already present.

msg: SOLR-4941: Fix handling of <mergePolicy> init arg "useCompoundFile" -> IndexWriterConfig

author: crossley
msg: Apache Rat 0.9 released and old incubator releases removed from mirrors.
